'''Tapestry of Golden Flames''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Frolicking Flames" [[Yoimiya]] ({{Pyro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Thundering Pulse]], a weapon tailored to Yoimiya's gameplay mechanics.
